user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send me (contact@medtechsolutions.com) an update about Greenleaf Health Center’s needs for the upcoming software update, and remind her she can review her Gmail and Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi Jane,

Could you please send an update on Greenleaf Health Center’s needs for the upcoming software release to contact@medtechsolutions.com at your earliest convenience? Feel free to review your Gmail and Notion workspace for any details you’ve previously gathered.

Thank you!

final_output:
